1370: Herardus moved to Die lange straet3.D.9 after marriage.
Got married to Gloria at age 28 in 1370.
1371: Had a daughter with Gloria, Ermegardis, at age 29.
1372: Had a son with Gloria, Assceric, at age 30.
1373: Had a son with Gloria, Laurens, at age 31.
Lost son Assceric when Assceric was 2 years old.
1374: Had a son with Gloria, Thitardo, at age 32.
1376: Had a daughter with Gloria, Leanne, at age 34.
Lost son Thitardo when Thitardo was 3 years old.
1378: Had a daughter with Gloria, Ermerut, at age 36.
1379: Had a daughter with Gloria, Wendelmodis, at age 37.
1380: Had a daughter with Gloria, Marie, at age 38.
1382: Lost daughter Leanne when Leanne was 7 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
1383: Had a son with Gloria, Ebram, at age 41.
Lost son Ebram when Ebram was 1 years old.
1386: Had a daughter with Gloria, Sipper, at age 44.
Lost daughter Sipper when Sipper was 1 years old.
